messages.title: Vote Conservative get Labour again
messages.content: Only Bridget Fox's Lib Dems can beat Labour in Islington.

messages.title: DO YOU WANT TO HELP GORDON?
messages.content: Voting Conservative will put a smile on his face.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cutting tax for those on middle and low incomes.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In Islington the Conservatives are in a poor third place and cannot win. Not voting or voting Conservative will just help Labour win again.

endorsements.endorser: Former Conservative candidate for Islington South & Finsbury
endorsements.endorsement: Backing the Lib Dems - he knows the Lib Dems are the only party that can deliver change for Islington.

quotes.text: Only Bridget Fox's Lib Dems can beat Labour here. No other result is possible.
